1433650.name: RPG Maker MZ - Eberouge Event Picture Pack1
1433650.description:
Upgrade the romance, nostalgia or suspense in your games and stories with these 37 new fantastic event backgrounds!

Eberouge Event Picture Pack 1 brings you 37 event backgrounds featuring characters in a variation of settings. Alternate files are included with the characters only (no background) so you can customize your characters environments and use them in all kinds of settings!

Features:

* files in PNG format
* Total of 37 graphics for event background (27 of these are 1000 x 740 pixel)
* Files come with variations of characters with and without background
* Compatible with RPG Maker MV, MZ and Visual Novel Maker
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers or the engines of your choice, however, please note that the sales of a game using this content is NOT allowed where the buyer is a corporation or any multi-person entity.
1433650.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
